programme.title: Anatomy of a Cyclist: Can Jolanda Neff outperform marathon runners?
programme.desc: The 2014 & 2015 cross-country World Cup winner demonstrates the supreme endurance required of an Olympic mountain biker and road racer.

programme.title: Determined duo hope to help shape UAE's sporting future
programme.desc: Veteran shooter Sheik Saeed Al Maktoum and road cyclist Yousif Mirza have a crucial role to play to help shape the UAE's sporting future.

programme.title: Men's Team Gold Medal Match KOR - FRA | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Team Gold Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 29/07/24. The Republic of Korea won the Gold Medal with a victory over France, who won Silver, 5:1

programme.title: Men's Team Bronze Medal Match TUR - CHN | Archery | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Team Bronze Medal Match took place at Invalides, Paris, on 29/07/24. Turkey won the Bronze Medal with a victory over the People's Republic of China 6:2

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 1
programme.desc: Usain's Insane 100m record, Norway's close finish, an Aussie Winter Olympian, South Korea archery domination, Perfect Comaneci.

programme.title: The Tech Race | Episode 3
programme.desc: In this episode: hockey tracking systems, tennis gliding shoes, ski helmets for the partially blind, archery technology, and hi-speed cameras for training.

programme.title: Choi (KOR) v Kharlan (UKR)- Women's Sabre Individual Bronze Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Sabre Individual Bronze Medal Bout between Sebin Choi (KOR) and Olga Kharlan (UKR) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Olga Kharlan (UKR) won Bronze with a 15:14 victory over Sebin Choi (KOR).

programme.title: Ilmura (JPN) v Itkin (USA) - Men's Foil Bronze Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Foil Bronze Medal Bout between Kazuki Ilmura (JPN) and Nick Itkin (USA) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste.Nick Itkin (USA) won Bronze with a 15:12 victory over Kazuki Ilmura (JPN).

programme.title: Apithy-Brunet (FRA) v Balzer (FRA) - Women's Sabre Individual Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Sabre Individual Gold Medal Bout between Sara Balzer (FRA) and Manon Apithy-Brunet (FRA) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Manon Apithy-Brunet (FRA) won Gold with a 15:12 victory over Sara Balzer (FRA) who won Silver.

programme.title: Cheung (HKG) v Macchi (ITA) - Men's Foil Gold Medal Bout | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Foil Gold Medal Bout between Ka Long Cheung (HKG) and Filippo Macchi (ITA) took place on 29/07/2024 at the Grand Palais Podium Piste. Ka Long Chueng (HKG) won Gold with a 15:14 victory over Filippo Macchi (ITA) who won Silver.

programme.title: Fitness Influencer vs Olympians featuring Brandon White
programme.desc: Fitness social influencer Brandon White is paired with fencer Enzo Lefort, football player Melissa Ortiz and sprinter Chris Brown in order to experience their demanding workouts. Can he keep up?

programme.title: Transform My Meal: France
programme.desc: Four French Olympic athletes meet up with world-class chefs in Paris, La Rochelle and Val dâ€™Isere to learn how to cook haute cuisine at home.

programme.title: Christiana Means: The Road to Recovery | skate-hers
programme.desc: Christiana Means, a 25-year-old skateboarder from the Philippines raised in South Carolina, moved to LA to pursue her dream. After major knee surgery and a year of recovery, she's back and more motivated than ever to push her limits in skateboarding.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 12 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 12 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, France, on 09/08/24. It included Women's Pole Vault Final, Men's Discus Throw Final, Men's 400m Final, and the Semi-Finals for 110m Hurdles, 400m Hurdles, 200m, 400m.

programme.title: Heroes of the Future - Giorgia Villa & Demis Angagregn
programme.desc: Giorgia Villa, a 12 year old Italian Artistic Gymnast, and Demis Angagregn, a 16 year old Runner from Ethiopia, compete for their future.

programme.title: Paris 2024 Memories | Episode 3
programme.desc: Relive with us the best moments of Paris, exclusive content from the 2024 Games where you can experience firsthand the excitement felt by the athletes from interviews to clips that will show you what is behind the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Heats, Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals & Finals | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Canoe Single 200m Heats, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Men's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Canoe Single 200m Quarter-Finals, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals and the Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 08/08/24.
The Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals were won by Liu Hao/Ji Bowen (CHN) with Gold, Gabriele Casadei/Carlo Tacchini (ITA) with Silver and Joan Antoni Moreno/Diego Dominguez (ESP) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by New Zealand who won Gold, Germany won Silver and Hungary won Bronze.
The Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by Germany who won Gold, Australia won Silver and Spain won Bronze.

programme.title: Canoe/Kayak: How to practice strokes and turns
programme.desc: American Michal Smolen demonstrates the basics of canoe slalom, including paddling, boat control, and turns.

programme.title: Helen Glover eyes Paris 2024 for her fourth Olympics | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: After winning back-to-back gold in London 2012 and Rio 2016, Helen Glover made a remarkable come-back in Tokyo 2020, being the first mother to row for Britain. She and partner Polly Swann finished fourth. Helen now has her sights on Paris 2024 where she should be competing in the Women's four event, focusing on adding another Olympic medal to her impressive career for Team GB.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Epee Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Epee Team Finals took place on 30/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. Italy won the Gold medal over France, who took Silver. Poland won the Bronze over China.

programme.title: Global Games II (Part I)
programme.desc: Four Olympians and four social media stars from around the world go head to head in mash-up competitions with an Olympic twist.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: In war-torn Iraq, this wheelchair fencer brings a message of hope
programme.desc: In Iraq, a roadside bomb left Ammar Ali in a wheelchair. The Paralympian is now determined to lead Iraq's wheelchair fencing team to gold.

programme.title: ARG-BEL Women's Bronze Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match with Argentina and Belgium took place on the 09/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 1. Final Score ARG 2(3):2(1) BEL.

programme.title: Paris 2024 Memories | Episode 3
programme.desc: Relive with us the best moments of Paris, exclusive content from the 2024 Games where you can experience firsthand the excitement felt by the athletes from interviews to clips that will show you what is behind the Olympic Games.

programme.title: SWE-CHN - Men's Team Gold Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Team Gold Medal Match Sweden v China, at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score CHN 3:0 SWE.
China won Gold, Sweden won Silver and France won Bronze.

programme.title: Mat B: Men's & Women's Freestyle - Day 15 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes Men's Freestyle 65kg and 97kg Semifinals and Freestyle 74kg and 125kg Finals as well as the Women's Freestyle 76kg Semifinals and Freestyle 62kg Finals.

programme.title: Women's Javelin Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Javelin Throw Final took place at Stade de France on the 10/08/24. Haruka Kitaguchi (JPN) won the Gold medal, Jo-Ane van Dyk (RSA) won the Silver medal and Nikola OgrodnÃ­kova (CZE) won the Bronze medal.

programme.title: Men's 20km Race Walk Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 01/08/2024 around TrocadÃ©ro. Pintado (ECU) claimed the Gold, Bonfim (BRA) Silver and Martin (ESP) completed the podium

programme.title: Paris 2024 Memories | Episode 6
programme.desc: Relive with us the best moments of Paris, exclusive content from the 2024 Games where you can experience firsthand the excitement felt by the athletes from interviews to clips that will show you what is behind the Olympic Games.

programme.title: EGY-MAR - Men's Bronze Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze Medal match with Egypt and Morocco, at La Beaujoire Stadium, Nantes, on 08/08/24. Final score MAR 6:0 EGY.

programme.title: Can an Olympic legend turn around Hout Bay's football team?
programme.desc: Team South Africa Olympic footballing legend Matthew Booth tries to turn around the fortunes of a struggling local football team.

programme.title: ESP-GER - Women's Bronze Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match Spain v Germany, at Lyon Stadium, Lyon, on 09/08/24. Final score GER 1:0 ESP.

programme.title: Men's Discus Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Discus Throw Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 07/08/24. Roje Stona (JAM) won the Gold with an Olympic Record distance of 70.00m. Mykolas Alekna (LTU) claimed Silver, and Matthew Denny (AUS) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's +81kg | Weightlifting | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Women's 81kg which took place at the South Paris Arena 6, France, on the 11/08/24. Li Wenwen (CHN) claimed Gold, Hyejeong Park (KOR) took Silver and Emily Campbell (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Paris 2024 Memories | Episode 6
programme.desc: Relive with us the best moments of Paris, exclusive content from the 2024 Games where you can experience firsthand the excitement felt by the athletes from interviews to clips that will show you what is behind the Olympic Games.

programme.title: Men's 10km | Marathon Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's 10km Marathon Swimming took place at Pont Alexandre III, France, on 09/08/2024. Kristof Rasovszky (HUN) won the Gold, with a time of 1:50:52.7 hour. Oliver Klemet (GER) won the Silver, and David Betlehem (HUN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Mixed Dinghy Medal Race - MX Multihull Medal Race - Men's & Women's Kitesurfing SFs A & B, Finals Heats 1, 2 | Sailing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Marseille Marina - Corniche, and Marseille Marina - Frioul, on 07/08/24.
In Mixed Dinghy, Vadlau/Maehr (AUT) won Gold, Okada/Yoshioka (JPN) won Silver and Dahlberg/Karlsson (SWE) won Bronze.
In Mixed Multihull, Tita/Banti (ITA) won Gold, Majdalani/Bosco (ARG) won Silver and Wilkinson/Dawson (NZL) won Bronze.
In Women's Kite, Eleanor Aldridge (GBR) won Gold, Laudriane Nolot (FRA) won Silver and Annelous Lammerts (NED) won Bronze.
